## Description {#details}

Marker class to iterate over the elements of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> in flat mode.

The class is used to either iterate in Flat mode or by not using it to not iterate in Flat mode. During a Flat mode iteration all Regions are entered and the iteration returns every <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>. If the Flat mode is not selected for SubRegions just one <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regionnode">RegionNode</a> containing the subregion is returned.

Definition at line 110 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/regioninfo-h">RegionInfo.h</a>.
